attributes.action: Remove bus lanes from Lord Street (Southport)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is a petition to try to put a stop to the endless 'ideas' that keep appearing on our streets costing us all money.

With the closure of Chapel Street, a main thoroughfare in Southport, the majority of the traffic has been diverted on to Lord Street, Which has now been reduced to one lane.

Southport is a popular tourist destination and as such this summer will be chaos if something is not done now. If you want to study road rage, I'm sure there will be plenty too see here.
